oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Composition entitled "The March of Time" by SH Hanner
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This composition, in typical prose of the 19th century, expounds on the march of time. The prose was part of the papers of either Jesse Prickle or Elijah Prickle who both served in Co. G, 3rd Tenn. Cav. Regt., USA and is signed by S. H. Harner. S. H. Harner can not be positively identified.
